style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Built To Spill
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Walking down endless rows of a green forest, the onslaught of hop aroma seduces one to a time, a place, a dream, a memory, an ideal ideal. How can I put that in a pint and deliver it unto you? Never limiting, always pursuing, climbing to the top. Allow yourself to be enveloped by this blanket of hops, and dream a little dream, of a forest of green.
name: Bull of the Woods Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: This all New Zealand hopped IPA features Nelson Sauvin, giving it a big punchy fruitiness, and Pacific Jade giving it a softer, cleaner bitterness than most Double IPA's like watching a Hawaiian sunset and then getting punched in the face by a local. BulletProof Tiger is unstoppable.
name: Bulletproof Tiger
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Bullion IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
Sometimes you get more then you bargained for. Bumper Crop yields a high ABV backed 
 with flavors and aromas of apricot, 
 white pepper, and naval oranges.
name: Bumper Crop
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Big and bold new IPA that borders on an imperial or double IPA. Utilizing Magnum, Columbus and Amarillo hops. Named for the lovely wife of the Big Lebowski. Just can’t keep her down on the farm.
name: Bunny Green Toe
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
This is a blended beer that we've been brewing for the past several years and it's recently been gaining in popularity.

For Burton Baton we first brew two 'threads' or batches of beer: an English-style Old Ale and an Imperial IPA. After fementating the separate beers in our stainless tanks, the two are transferred and blended together in one of our large oak tanks. Burton Baton sits on the wood for about a month.

When enjoying the Burton Baton, you'll find an awesome blend of the citrus notes from Northwestern hops melding with woody, vanilla notes from the oak. The wood also tends to mellow the 10% of the beer - so tread cautiously!

Burton Baton is brewed and released three times per year.
name: Burton Baton
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Buzzer Beater is a super hopped double IPA. This beer is brewed with five different hop varieties just in time for the madness of March. Starting with citrus aroma and finishing with a huge hop flavor this beer is surely every hop head lovers dream. Sit down with a good friend and enjoy!
name: Buzzer Beater
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Everything you love about an IPA and then some. Buzzsaw IPA is an aggressively hopped high alcohol monster that has perfectbalance of flavors that make this beer very drinkable.
name: Buzzsaw
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
A big, bold hop-forward west coast style IPA. The malt character is subdued to showcase a blend of Simcoe, Summit, Citra, and Centennial Hops creating a lingering dry finish with notes of pine, grapefruit, and apricot.
Buzzsaw’s recipe is the creation of former head brewer Bill Gerds. It was named in honor of Treetown’s original industry and was named best of show at the 2011 World Expo of Beer.
name: Buzzsaw American IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Dry hopped with Centennial.
name: Bye Felicia
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Imperial IPA
name: C Monster
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Brewed and dry-hopped with all seven “C” hops. A deep copper color with a piney, citrusy, floral and resinous aroma. Full hop flavor with a rich caramel malt finish and an endless developing hop presence.
name: C-Sons Greetings
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Brewed with a wasteful amount of the very best hops we could secure. An ample malt bill is paired with a huge dose of pungent hop flavor. Citrus dominates the aroma, accentuated by notes of melon, pine, and tropical fruit.
name: Ca$h Mony
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Café Racer 15™ features aromas of bright citrus and resinous pine from the generous use of Citra, Amarillo, Cascade and Chinook hops which are complimented by a dry malt finish. The result is a high revving Double IPA that is loud and assertive, much like the rebellious street racers who inspired it. Never ride alone…
name: Café Racer 15
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
Cutter (n)—a single-masted sailing vessel with the mast set about two-fifths of the way aft along the waterline

Imperial IPA. Double IPA. XIPA. IIPA. Whatever you want to call it, Calcutta Cutter is our homage to hops. Lots of hops. Early hops. Late hops. Very late hops. Dry hops. Then we condition the bottles in a bed of hops. Well, maybe not that last bit, but you get the idea. With just enough malt body and alcohol to balance the beer out, we let the lupulin shine.
name: Calcutta Cutter
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Caleb’s High Noon, blended to showcase the true form of a West Coast Imperial IPA with our own brand of East Coast craft, engulfs the senses from boil to bottle. An unrepentant outlaw brewed to remind your palate that the high alpha acid Simcoe, Columbus, and Centennial hops are a force to be reckoned with. With a robust, piney flavor this 100+ IBU brute will have you armed and ready to face the  final showdown.
name: Caleb’s High Noon
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Aggressively hopped, yet well-balanced. This Double IPA has a distinct body and hoppy bite.
name: Cane Blade
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: strong-style India Pale Ale, deep copper in color with a big, malty, hoppy palate and dry hopped for a spicy, citrus aroma
name: Cannonball Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: This beer is the one beer that our brewers and I would take to that mythical deserted island if we could only bring one Marshall Wharf beer. Huge malt backbone matched with huge amounts of hops.
name: Cant Dog Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: The big brother to Iso Heaven, Columbus hops make their presence known in the aroma and taste of this beer, with a dank nose and citrusy finish.
name: Cap City Hustler
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: In support of the Bike MS: City to Shore ride we brewed a special Double IPA packed with three different varieties of hops. You’ll be amazed how Perfectly the hop flavor comes out in this surprisingly smooth beer!
name: Cape May City to Shore: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Our Cape of Good Hope, which changes year to year, pays homage to the original style and adventurous spirit of the first British IPAs. Our 2014 release is a West Coast style double IPA. There’s Columbus in the kettle, Chinook in the whirlpool and Mosaic in the hopback. We’ve dry hopped Cape with Mosaic, Crystal, Cluster, and Pacific Jade hops as well.  Pilsner malt gives this brew a beautiful golden hue. The end result is a dry, crisp ale with unmistakable flavors and aromas of tropical fruits.
name: Cape of Good Hope
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Capsized
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Captain Ron's Double IPA has a big hop flavor, enough malt character to balance flavors & bitterness and a pleasing citrusy aroma. This ale is aggressively hopped with of Summit, Cascade, and Columbus hops, with two substantial additions of Summit hops during fermentation and cold conditioning.
name: Captain Ron's Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Our newest year-round is an Imperial India Pale Ale brewed with high-quality pilsner malt and flaked oats, making this beer light in color but certainly not in body or alcohol content. It is aggressively hopped with Mosaics out of the Pacific Northwest, giving the Captain’s Daughter a strong aroma and flavor of tropical and stone fruits.
name: Captain's Daughter
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: This beer is a salute to the ingenuity and creativity of the American craft brewers. A uniquely American style of beer, the Double or Imperial IPA, has become the calling card of many craft brewers who aren't afraid to push the limits of what hops can add to a beer. This beer is big and hoppy - not for the faint of heart! Be prepared to experience sensory overload as you savor this Imperial IPA.
name: Captain's Reserve Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Imperial Black Citra Pale Ale
name: Car Ramrod
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Carolina Chaos
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Carolina Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Carolinus Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Carpetbagger
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Full flavored, ever evolving, and usually barrel-aged! This years version is a dark red Imperial IPA made with Michigan red wheat, oats, and rye. High alcohol, very hoppy, and dry-hopped to the max!
name: Carvana
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Made with Cascade hops from Hop Head Farms in Michigan.
name: Cascade Ninja
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Douple IPA dry hopped with Azacca. Ripe mango, tropical fruit, smooth rounded bitterness, sustained impressions of citrus, with notes of orchard fruit (pears, apples) and pine throughout.
name: Cat Love
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Cat Nipp
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Cat's Pajamas
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
The Uprising! series is a lot of 3 beers — Catalyst, Outbreak and Riot — that leverage the malt bill from Salute while bringing epic proportions of different hops to your respective mouth holes.

This beer truly is an anthem to the Amarillo hop. Tons of grapefruit citrus with very little lingering bitterness. It’s deceivingly quaffable. Brewed only twice (totaling just 40 barrels of hoppy goodness), this beer is in limited supply and should be enjoyed in a timely manner. Like… now. What are you waiting for?
name: Catalyst
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: This Third Coast IPA is brewed with a ridiculous amount of hops and just enough malt sweetness to create a smooth, delectable finish.  “Cooked” with eight different hop varieties, Catalyst has a complex and unique blend of citrus, pine, and dank.  Palatable and intense enough to give even the biggest hop head a jolt.
name: Catalyst
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: The most powerful IPA in the Due South Category series, the Cat 5 is big on hops and big on flavor.  Clocking in at 8.5% ABV and 96 IBU’s, the first bands of malts will make way for the surge of hops on the palate.  Designed for the true hophead, this is not a beer for the faint of heart.
name: Category 5 IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Big on hops and alcohol, this double is anything but lame. We stuffed hops into this monster 8 times and then dry-hopped the hell out of it! Get a glass and savor what the Pacific Northwest grows so well! Hops!
name: Category 57
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Catherine is a double IPA brewed with huge amounts of classic American hops along with a relative new comer.  Dangerously drinkable at 8.2% and packed with hop flavor and aroma.
name: Catherine
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A golden colored medium body “Imperialistic” IPA that starts off with a massive grapefruit nose and continues with smooth malt backbone and a big punch of citrus and grapefruit zest.
name: Catherine the Great
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A very full bodied, citrus and malty Imperial Double IPA that contains 120 lbs. of clover honey from Hunber's Honey Farm in Martinsville Indiana. It is dry hopped with Galaxy and Cascade hops.
name: Centennial Martyr Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Chain Breaker
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Chaman is a dry-hopped strong beer with strong amber hues and dominating hop flavours and tastes. It is however well balanced through the presence of a combination of malts, and alcohol is present is not overwhelming. Thus, it is a very complex and bitter beer, but always well balanced.
name: Chaman
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: This beer pours surprisingly light gold, with a huge amount of dry-hopping introduced into each batch. A spectrum of hop flavors and aromas with especially notable grapefruit and pine character.
name: Chaotic Double India Pale Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Inspired by the demand for big beers with big hops, and for those chasing the next hop "fix".  Seven different types of hop strains are used to brew this limited-release Imperial IPA.
name: Chasing The Dragon
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Chatty Cathy IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Named for a local canyon, deep amber in color, this Double IPA has a powerfully floral aroma of grapefruit, pine and tropical fruits. Full bodied with subtle malt tones. Brewed with 11 different hop additions and moderately bitter, the emphasis is on hop flavor and aroma and a long, hoppy finish.
name: Chesebro IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Inspired by the North Coast’s dedicated (and sometimes chilly) surf community, our Double IPA will melt the ice in your beard and never lose its balance.
name: Chillwave
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Harvest Double IPA – We filled our brew kettle chock-full of fresh Michigan Summit and Columbus from our friends at Michigan Hop Alliance. The product is a beer that showcases pungent aromas of pine, earth and ripe citrus. The flavor is incredibly resinous and juicy. Our staff picks up hints of tangerine and grapefruit that is balanced by a nice pine-like bite. It finishes nice and crisp with a slight malted sweetness from the use of Vienna and Crystal malts.
name: Chock-Full o' Hops
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A pale creamy head lingers and laces the sides of the glass atop this “Hop Lover’s” dream. Polaris, Cluster and Citra hops produce a sweet nose with floral, citrus and pine tones upon a medium malt body and crisp bitter finish.
name: Choss
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Blood orange in color, dissipating head, biscuit, floral and piney aromas, chewy malt backbone balanced with blossoming hop flavors and a bright enduring finish. Brewed with Crisp Pale and Maris Otter, Gambrinus Munich, Castle Caramel Malt, Cascade, Simcoe, German Northern Brewer, Centennial Hops and our proprietary English yeast strain.
name: Chubacca Double India Pale Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Chubble Double
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Chucky
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Deep honey Amber in color with a tan silky head, tropical and stone fruit, citrus and pine aromas, smooth bready and earthy mouthfeel, followed by a bright sharp finish. Brewed with Gambrinus Pale, Pilsner and Munich, Castle Crystal and Simpson Maris Otter malt, Mosaic and Simcoe hops with our proprietary English Yeast strain.
name: ChuuCh Double India Pale Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
A uniquely large beer developed by taking our Tuileries IPA and putting it on steroids.   It is an English Double India Pale Ale brewed with English Maris Otter, Crisp 60 Crystal, doubling the Columbus and East Kent Golding Hops then brought to life with my beloved Burton Ale Yeast.   After all this, dry hopped in the brite tank for 2 weeks with even more Columbus hops.  The result is a hop bomb that is so balanced that even those who say they don’t like IPA’s are in love with it. 



Cinderella’s Twin Double IPA
In the great tradition of the Cinderella Twin Drive-In Theater (may she rest in peace), a big Imperial IPA with the perfect balance of hops and malt blend to tantalize your tongue.
name: Cinderella’s Twin Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Cisco Reserve Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Citra Bomb
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A double IPA that is hazy pale in color with a strong pungent aroma that comes from large amounts of Citra hops.
name: Citra Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Citra High
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: An Imperial IPA bittered, flavored, and dry hopped exclusively with Citra.
name: Citra Imperial IPA (Double Citra)
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Our newest Double IPA showcases one of our favorite hops: Citra.  A big, bitter, dank ale that is dominated by the citrus flavors of Citra.  The use of Chinook, Amarillo and Simcoe in this ale were no match for the Citra Brute.  Citra Must be Destroyed!
name: Citra Must Be Destroyed
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Citra Showers
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Welcome to the world of bright, citrus and tropical fruit forward IPA’s. This divinely hoppy brew will clock in at 83IBUs and will pour a hazy golden color with a big white head. Aromas of lemon peel, tangerine, and passion fruit come through on the nose with some dank undertones. The flavor profile begins with an intense hop bitterness that is complimented by slightly sweet, caramel malt in the finish.
name: Citra Splendor
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Citra Warrior
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: CitraDIPAty
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Citrus Ninja Exchange is the first of two collaboration beers brewed with The Charleston Beer Exchange. The first incarnation (released on draft only in September 2011) was a single-hopped Cascade double IPA brewed with approximately 50 lbs of fresh grapefruit, and then dry-hopped 4 times in the fermentor. The 2012 version has a simplified malt bill and uses a blend of American and New Zealand hop varieties.
name: Citrus Ninja Exchange
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: An imperial IPA dry-hopped with Citra and Galaxy.
name: Civil Unrest
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A balanced & boldly aromatic imperial IPA; brewed with Warrior, Amarillo, Mosaic & Belma hops, then dry-hopped with even more Belma; clean, round & fruit forward with effusive notes of citrus in the nose (mandarin orange, meyer lemon, grapefruit & tangerine).
name: Clamor
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Hops are the hero in this powerhouse. Hopped throughout with Simcoe and Centennial, Clencher is loaded with pine and citrus aromas and the body and alcohol to compliment it’s assertive flavors.
name: Clencher
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Climax Come Again
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Clock Tower
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
Take your love of hops to new heights.


A hop aficionado’s dream, this robust beer boldly combines three highly potent American hop varieties: Columbus, Chinook and Cascade. With its complex flavors and intense hop character, it delivers an experience that’s not for the faint of heart.
name: Cloud Hopper Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Cloudbursting
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: "Coastal Evacuation": a phrase common at the Jersey Shore. Hurricane season hits hard, and we're hitting back with a Double IPA able to withstand the storm. Copious amounts of Centennial hops dominate the flavor from start to finish. It's time to evacuate-are you prepared?
name: Coastal Evacuation
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Coastbuster was first brewed as a Side Trail Series brew and with an overwhelming response, we have decided to adopt Coastbuster Imperial IPA into our year round Upland Brew Lineup! Inspired by the gloriously effervescent qualities of hop varieties common to West Coast style Imperial IPAs, Coastbuster is our vehicle for displaying the best of what these hops have to offer: their tropical, fruity, and floral aromas and flavors.
name: Coastbuster
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: The Coat of Arms is a strong symbol of a family or clan meant to identify friends from foe. Wear yours proud and hoist your glass high. Drink down this Imperial Pale Ale that stays low on bitterness but packs big juicy, citrusy and passion fruit flavors from Columbus, Cascade and Mosaic hops.
name: Coat of Arms
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Cobra
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Our India Pale Ale is brewed in a California IPA style. The beer is generously hopped for bitterness with Magnum hops and finished with fresh Amarillo, Ahtanum and Cascade hops.
name: Cobra-Hood IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Codebreaker
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
When the loveable "hopheads" at Humpy's Great Alaskan Alehouse requested a winter version of alehouse favorite Sockeye Red IPA, our brewers instinctively spawned CoHoHo Imperial IPA.

CoHoHo begins with generous measures of pale two-row and specialty malts along with spirit-boosters like brown sugar and honey. Hefty doses of Cascade, Centennial and Simcoe hops beautifully balance that outrageous malt bill while juniper berries heighten the festive character of this exuberant beer.

Make Merry all Winter Long...
name: CoHoHo Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: In bringing together artisans from disparate aural planes, one might expect an offbeat, feedback-warped cacophony, shrill to the point of unlistenable. Yet, by inviting Kyle Hollingsworth, keyboardist for eclectic, jam-prone sextet, The String Cheese Incident, and Keri Kelli, wailing rock guitarist of Alice Cooper fame, we were able to make truly beautiful music. Turns out, these musicians have a great deal in common, both with each other and with Stone. We all enjoy turning things up to 11, and that is represented in this collaborative offering, an imperial India pale ale ably backed by Nugget, Comet and Calypso hops, and amplified care of a healthy dry-hopping with Vic's Secret, a new Australian hop, adding citrus and tropical fruit oomph. To give this modern masterpiece some soulful, classic character, we traced the roots of brewing to the days when Old World herbs were used to spice beers, adding in coriander and, a first for us, elderberries. To stand up to that sumptuous spice and blaring bitterness, we added golden naked oats, which are lightly roasted and add body and enhanced mouthfeel to the brew like a steady, unbreakable backbeat to an incendiary jam solo. Sit back, crank the volume and get lost in this operatic incarnation of genres combined in the name of invention.
name: Collective Distortion IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
Mother Nature's seasons are amazing, where all her creations flux between an existence in winter's comatose state, spring's colorful fling, summer's hot dance, and fall's laid back swing. The creative juices of musicians jump from an unconscious, winter mindset spuring you to think concerts, road trips and campsites. One sip of this beer will get your blood flowing as you jam to your favorite tunes!

Disclaimer: We don't recommend hanging upside down in a tree, you're not Eddie... It seems fitting to chill in a hammock while listening to great music and sipping a triple-dry hopped, Imperial IPA -- Music for the taste buds!

Malt: High Color Pale, Bonlander Munich, Carafoam
Hops: Bravo, Zythos, Zeus, Chinook, Cascade, Summit
name: Comatose
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Our most heavily hopped beer with 2 lbs per barrel. An Imperial IPA with a spicy and piney hop flavor and aroma.
name: Conductor
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
Hop aboard and experience the three "all-American" hop varieties – Warrior, Tomahawk and Simcoe – which our brewers have worked into this Imperial India Pale Ale. The team focused on the key attributes of each hop for the best interplay of aromatics and bitterness with the malt extraction. The result is a floral citrus nose, bold bitterness and a hint of sweetness. Once again, the Steam Team is on time and on track.

Silver Medal Winner, 2009 European Beer Star Awards
Silver Medal Winner, 2009 Australian International Beer Competition
name: Conductor Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: ’Cone Crusher’ our 8.6% IPA is bursting with overwhelming amounts of citrusy Amarillo hops. This IPA showcases tropical fruit overtones of orange and mango, while being backed by a pleasing earthiness to make for a crushable beer.
name: Cone Crusher
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: We call it Cone Flakes because you might as well have poured hops into a bowl, added beer, and used a spoon. Cone Flakes is brewed with 7 hop varieties strategically added during the brewing process to provide a maelstrom of fruity and herbal hop tones. Look for flavors of mango, ruby red grapefruit, melon, passionfruit, thyme/herbs, black pepper, lime, and pine. Malt not forgotten, a base of UK pale malt and German Vienna provide just enough body and character to keep the bitterness and ABV from getting the best of the flavor!
name: Cone Flakes
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Conga is Revival Brewings first imperial IPA. Made with extra pale malt, white wheat, white rye, light Munich and crystal malts. Seven different hop addiditions were made in this recipe and a total of 30 lbs. of dry hops were used. Crisp, floral, citrusy and extremely boozy.
name: Conga Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Conniption Fit
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: This well balanced Double IPA is crisp with a touch of sweetness. The beautiful malted rye gives a full body mouthfeel and a dry bread finish. It is all complemented by a harmonious partnership of Cascade, Centennial and Simcoe hops like putting your face in a loaf of fresh bread while sitting barefoot outside at a music festival.
name: Contact Rye
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Continuously hopped during brewing and massively dry hopped. A seasonal offering in the Brewer's Reserve Series.
name: Continuum Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: We are pleased to announce the first in the Cooper’s Series of beers, which are aged in New White American Oak Wine Barrels. These barrels impart a nice, wine- like flavor and aroma into our IIPA; complimenting the floral/fruity character of the hops used in it’s recipe. You would be extremely hard pressed to find a beer like this anywhere in the country! Look for woody/coconut and fresh melon/passion fruit notes in this absolutely unique beer.
name: Cooper’s Series #1: Hopwood
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
Inspired by: Tom Wolve's Electric Kool-Aid Acid Test

"A perception of the cosmic unity of this higher level. And a feeling of timelessness," is what we are hoping to put into your glass.

Malt: 2-row, Vienna, Dextrin
Hops: Mosaic, Citra, Nelson Sauvin, Amarillo
Brewer Notes: Cosmic Unity is a tropical hop experience. With over 4 pounds of hops per barrel. This beer produces a dank aroma of papaya, mango, guava, and chardonnay grape. The balanced malt bill was designed to be dry, allowing the hops to be the focus showing how these varieties work with one another to create new and exciting flavor profiles. We recommend allowing the beer to breathe for a few minutes and arming with your hands to truly allow the sticky hop oils to infiltrate your senses. "You're either on the bus or off the bus." Enjoy!
name: Cosmic Unity
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Join us on a transcendental journey free from the shackles of physical existence and beyond the known realms of consciousness. Let your mind’s eye guide you to the astral planes of extrasensory non-being where we will collectively ride the cosmic waves of unity deep inside the endless barrel of the infinite void. Also, this is a strong, hoppy beer.
name: Cosmic Wave Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Cosmik Debris is a golden, brilliant Double IPA with a relatively dry flavor and assertive hop aroma.  Intense aromas of melon and citrus zest, lead to a soft palate featuring a carefully struck balance between firm bitterness and malt. The beer is brewed using Simcoe, Eureka, Idaho 7, Mosaic, and Cascade hops, which create beautiful notes of starfruit and orange marmalade on the palate.
name: Cosmik Debris
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: We take a Belgian-style base ale and essentially double the malt and hops, then age it on Brettanomyces and wrap it up with big Citra and Amarillo hops to provide 85IBUs and 8.2%abv of one great tasting Farmhouse India Pale Ale.
name: Cotton Pickin' Farmhouse IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: This monster of a double IPA is made with 10 different hops. It is citrusy, a little piney, and not overly resinous. Cottons is clear in color, low in malt, and very hop forward.
name: Cottons
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Count Hopula
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: 2nd Anniversary
name: Coup de Main
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Way up in the Keewenaw Peninsula in Michigans UP, Mt. Bohemia ski area has a powder run hidden at the top called \Cousin Jack"(named after the Cornish miners)that winds its' way steeply through the rocks and trees. AAAHHH WINTER!!! Double the Belgian Malt"
name: Cousin Jax
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
More Citra, more Columbus, more Simcoe, more Cascade and a dose more Citra
hops. Huge tropical flavors like pineapple, mango and orange juice.
name: Covalent
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: American Imperial IPA brewed with Summit, Simcoe and Citra hops. +150 IBU
name: Cowboys From Hops
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: This beer is crazy! More than four times the amount of hops than our hoppy bitch, Crazy Bitch explodes with hop flavor and aroma. The German-style malt stays very much in the background, giving just a hint of sweet flavor and body, and letting the hops take center stage. You’ll find aromas of grapefruit, lemon zest, bright pine and various herbs from the irresponsibly copious doses of Yakima hops, and you’ll find even more complexity and depth when you take your first sip. Our Double IPA is unique in that it has a restrained alcohol level, pale color, and a smooth, approachable bitterness, letting you enjoy more delicious Crazy Bitch without palette fatigue. This brew is made for all you crazy Hop-Heads.
name: Crazy Bitch
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Saison Style
name: Crazy Eights
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: In May of 1961, President John F. Kennedy announced the ambitious goal of sending an American to the Moon. Just over eight years later, Apollo 11 commander Neil Armstrong set foot on the lunar surface. The underlying motives in the space race have long been debated, but recently unclassified documents have finally revealed just what they were looking for. Long considered too dangerous for the general public, but now produced for you: Sun King Brewery’s Cream Dream 8: Hops in Space.
name: Cream Dream 8: Hops In Space
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: limited release Imperial IPA brewed with an ever changing combination of American hops.
name: Creeper
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Criminally Bad Elf
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Brewed with honey and blood orange juice.
name: Crimson Snapper
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
In Mikkeller we have over the years done many collaboration brews. However, the last one we did was a little unusual – we collaborated with the Swedish tattoo studio Crooked Moon.

The two brothers Jacob and Jonas Pedersen that run Crooked Moon Tattoo in Helsingborg wanted to celebrate their tattoo studio’s first birthday with a big party, and what could be more natural than to do it with a beer in their own name?

The two brothers have designed the labels for this beer. And therefore this beer comes with two different labels. One by of Jacob, and the other by Jonas.

The beer is just like a Crooked Moon tattoo: strong and powerful. In this case we are talking about a violently hoppy double IPA with 9% alcohol.
name: Crooked Moon Tattoo
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Crooked Tail Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Cross Hare Double IPA takes over where our Hare Trigger IPA stops. With a deep amber malt profile and an intense hopping cycle, Cross Hare will change your notion of what a great IPA can be. Big, Bold, Balanced, and Decisive, this brew delivers a new kind of experience for IPA lovers; you'll feel like you've been caught in the cross hairs of a great beer and the bullseye is centered square on your beer palate!
name: Cross Hare
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Crowd Control is an American, hop-forward IPA. Abundant kettle hopping and extensive dry hopping keep the malt in check, while showcasing the flavors and nose of an IPA that can barely be contained. A symphony of grapefruit, pine hops and citrus, it’s a great testament to the true art of dry hopping beer. Drink fresh and don’t resist.
name: Crowd Control
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Crusher
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: We at Naked City created this beer as response to the crazy hype around another well-known Triple IPA no longer available in the Seattle market. We took inspiration from Big Time Brewing and their Whiny the Complainer. We didn’t set out to brew a clone of that “certain beer.” We just merely want to put our spin on it and let people know that you can indeed get some amazing, extremely hoppy beers in the great state of Washington and most certainly in The Naked City.
name: Cry Me A River
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A citrus packed grapefruit flavor rounds off an intensely aromatic, and aggressively bitter IIPA. You’ll cry real good.
name: Cryin’ Holy IIPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Cryptic Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Cryptid
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: As the Curiosity series moves from adolescence to adulthood, we went back to basics with this single hop Double IPA featuring Mosaic!  The intent with Twenty was to capture the essence of Mosaic as purely as possible, thus a dead simple malt bill of just 2-row, light crystal, and dextrin malt bill was paired with a super neutral ale yeast yielding a perfectly complementary base upon which Mosaic can shine!  We smell and taste orange find, mango, and a bit of berry punctuated by a lemon peel finish. Soft, dry and delicious - be warned, it drinks like a pale ale!
name: Curiosity Twenty
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Cutie Pie
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Brewed with a strong, aromatic and complex hop mixture, this well-rounded IPA boasts grapefruit and pine flavors with a hint of pepper.
name: D's Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: IPA - India Pale Ale - is the last time in advance. This traditional extra hopped beer is firmly underway by American brewers. The Americans brew beer there so hopped that, once you remove the crown manifests a mushroom cloud. Are Emelisse are attempted this hopbom with success: although extremely Emelisse Double IPA maintains perfect balance between fruity and bitter.
name: D.I.P.A. Double India Pale Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: D9NASTY
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: The one and only IPA that doesn't leave your pallet with a bitter after taste. This beer took years of practice to get down and when we finally got it right, we knew it. The beer is made with three malts in considerable additions that leave it with a more malty and sweet taste. There are five different hop additions that were carefully planed out to impart just enough bitterness to give it the body and depth that it needed without leaving you with the astringent and bitter aftertaste. We then added a plethora of English flavor and aroma hops that round out the floral and citrus esters. With the beer being so well balanced between bitter and sweet, we than added \big sacks"of bittering hops to the conditioning vessel to impart all the wonderful citrus and floral notes deep into the beer while leaving the bittering aspects of the hop behind. The result was a beer that makes you want to nose dive right in complimented by the well balanced taste of this wonderful brew."""
name: Daddy Fat Sacs Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Daddy Warbucks$
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Daikaiju
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: La dalva est de couleur ambrée, aux reflets légèrements cuivrés. Une bière puissante qui conjugue les arômes fruités des houblons américains et une amertume agréable et persistance en bouche.
name: Dalva
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
It is a judges’ favorite and mine too. Our Dammed Double IPA has more hops than logs in a dam! Yet, you would never know it. This beer carries all of the spicy and earthy complexity that hops offers without the harsh bitterness. With a clean finish, this beer is proof that God loves you, and He wants you to be happy.

Gold Medal – World Beer Championships 2014
name: Dammed!
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Dangerously Close To Stupid
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Just as Daniel was adventurous, this double is named after his pioneering spirit. It has a citrus hop bomb in the nose and a massive, resinous hop flavor. And despite the 9% ABV, this is one crushable double IPA.
name: Daniel's Double
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Dank Buster
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
Alone and cold on a frigid fall night, the evil Dr. Dank’s stomach rumbled. It had been days since devouring the last of his trannies and platypuseses. Desperate, he wandered into his kitchen only to find a 3-eyed rat, yellow toenails, and an old bean burrito. Always resourceful, Dr. Dank remembered his great, great, bouffalata, granny goose’s Ghoulash recipe.  Try as he might, he couldn’t get it right, so he dumped everything he could find from the fridge and cupboard into one giant boiling brew, resulting in this stew of 2-row, black wheat, munich malt and a 14-hop variety asplifidation of Willamette, Galena, Mt. Hood, Nugget, Perle, Aroma, Bobek, Aurora, Styrian, Golding, Magnum, Columbus, Summit, Millennium, and Crystal.

Sloppy seconds never tasted so ghood!
name: Dank Tank Ghoulash
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Brewed with a monster mix of pure barley malts and stitched together with an insane amount of the stinkiest hops we could find, the frightful concoction is determined to be quite dank. It is quadruple-hopped in the brewkettle and fermented on even more hops.  This is one of our famous rotating house beers that had previously only been available in our Tasting Room but was made available in bottles in 2009.
name: Dankenstein IIPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Dankzilla
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A heavy malt foundation includes Crystal malt for sweetness and just enough Midnight Wheat malt to push the color to black. The bitterness is huge, but balanced by malt sweetness and alcohol burn. The hop flavors and aromas range from citrus to floral to pine thanks to a delicious blend of hand-selected Chinook and Centennial hops.
name: Dark Penance
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Daylight DIPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: With twice the amount of hops than our regular India Pale Ale, Dead On Arrival will wreak havoc on your palate from first sip to last swig. One things for sure when done with DOA, taste buds will be consigned to the grave.
name: Dead on Arrival
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Dead or Alive Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Dead Sea Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Deadlift Imperial IPA is unlike any Imperial IPA you've ever lifted from the beer aisle. It has the strong hop flavor you'd expect from an Imperial IPA, but no heaviness that could weigh down your desire to take another sip. The unique flavor stems in part from the Nelson Sauvin hops imported from New Zealand. These hops have an intense citrus, berry like aroma and flavor not found in any other variety. Deadlift's simple but fully braced malt backbone muscles up enough malty sweetness and caramel character to spot the incredibly robust hop aroma and flavor. The result will surely be a welcome workout for your taste buds.
name: Deadlift Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
Winner of the first Olde Hickory ProAm!

Alex Buerckholtz, owner of Hops & Vines in Asheville, NC, was the winner of the First Olde Hickory Pro Am competition with this very fine beer. Our brew master says: 71lbs of high alpha hops were used to make this beer. That’s just over 20 grams of hops used for each pint! DBH was brewed with 2 row barley, Carapils and Crisp Crystal 45 malts and fermented to 7% alc/vol. DBH was hopped with 5 different West Coast hops: Chinook, Columbus, Simcoe, Centennial and Cascade. Additionally, DBH was twice dry hopped with different combinations of these hops. The net result is an amazing aroma of ripe juicy fruit mixed in with a bouquet of spring flowers. DBH was brewed to a level of bitterness of 108 IBU’s, and leaves a lingering bitterness; it is, after all, a Double IPA!
name: Death By Hops
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Death By Hops
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Death By Viking
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Debaser
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: An American Double IPA made with 10 different types of hop strains, each contributing 100 IBU’s of bitterness to a 10% ABV beer. It’s a decade of Decade-ence! Made by brewers Sean Redmond and Shane Welch.
name: Decade-ence
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Decadence Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Decadent Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Belgian DIPAs aren’t a typical beer style, but the first beer on a new brewhouse isn’t typical. We are "declaring" our brewing independence with this hybrid brew, the first one on our system. Twice the normal amount of Simcoe, Amarillo and Centennial hops contribute spicy grapefruit, orange and piney aromas while warm fermentation unleashes the bright citrus esters of our Belgian yeast.
name: Declaration
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A light blonde citrus tasting beer, very easy drinking for its strength.
name: Deco IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Decompression Double India Pale Ale is a hazy, golden yellow Double IPA with a simple and compact malt bill. We used Falconer's Flight, East Kent Goldings, Palisade and Experimental Pine Fruit hops to provide a complex and intricate hop profile. Decompression DIPA is a heavy hitter, weighing in at 9.0% ABV and 91 IBUs while still retaining its balance. Be sure drink this brew responsibly!
name: Decompression
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Deep Impact
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Deep In The Green
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Huge quantities of Two Row, crystal, and munich malts, set the stage for this strong, highly bitter, hugely aromatic Double IPA.  Between kettle additions and dry hops, a total of nearly 26 pounds of hops went into only 14 kegs of this beer!  Hold on to your taste buds and enjoy responsibly; This beer is not for the faint of heart!
name: DeePah DIPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Defector
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: DELETE THIS BEER PLEASE
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
Our house Saison yeast lends notes of white pepper and spice, while Nelson Sauvin, 
 Citra, and Amarillo provide a 
 deluge of hop character.
name: Deluge
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
Don't fight it, Spite It!

Dear Demanda,

We just can't stand ya!

You are the most demanding B-word ever.

Because you always seem to get what we want, we brewed this

Double IPA with copious amounts of Citra and Centennial hops.

There is also just enough malt to shut you up.

So please enjoy and stop all of your bitching!
name: Demanda Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Demenfia Dog
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Demonik
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: If you are not current on dental insurance, beware, as the hop levels of this beer will give the perception that the enamel is coming off your teeth!  Centennial, Summit, Columbus, Falconer's Flight, and Zythos hops were used everywhere from in the mash to being served through a "randall" full of hops.  Yet, unlike some big IPAs, the Denamelizer has enough malt complexity and body to at least attempt to balance the insane amount of hops used - enjoy!
name: Denamelizer Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: DeRail IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Derek's Night In Jail
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: This insanely hoppy Double IPA will make your taste buds stay after school. You messed with Hop For Teacher, now welcome to detention!
name: Detention Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A scenic tour of hops, Detour Double IPA is bright and bold with lively hop character.
name: Detour
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Over 100 International Bitterness Units and a starting gravity of 1.074. This beer uses over 60 pounds of hops in a brew size of 400 gallons. 36 pounds alone in the dry hop stage. That�s a lot of hops! Hops are: Tomahawk, Centennial, Cascade, Amarillo and Simcoe.
name: Deuce Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Our double IPA celebrates the beauty of high alpha hops balanced by a solid malt backbone. First brewed in 2007, Deuces is now part of the Strategic Reserves Series with Aces & Ates, Big Operator and Monkey Bizz-Ness.
name: Deuces Wild
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: When you dance with the Devil, the Devil don’t change. You do. Massive in complexity, the huge malt character balances the insane amount of alphas used to create it. At an incredible 112 IBUs, it’s dry-hopped with ten hop varieties.
name: Devil Dancer
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: An all out assault on the senses. Devil Dog is an Imperial IPA with a floral / citrus hop aroma and flavor. This beer ages well and will take on some barley wine characteristics with time.
name: Devil Dog Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Devil's Vault
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Devils Double
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: This bier is a hophead’s dream come true. At 130 IBUs, this imperial IPA can only be described as a full scale assault on your palate. Enormous hop presence on the front end is balanced nicely by a significant malt backbone and a very clean finish, creating an extremely drinkable 9% ABV bier.
name: DFG IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Dieselpunk Double IP
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: The latest addition to our dinosaur series, this intense beer features Citra and Mosaic hops and hibiscus. Strong citrus and tropical fruit flavored dominate.
name: Dilophosaurus Facemelter Hibiscus Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Our first Double IPA – dry, refreshing and hoppy. We really focused on hop flavor and aroma here. To maximize hop character, we dry hopped Dinner twice with over 6 lbs. of hops per barrel. For the best experience, please enjoy fresh as possible.
name: Dinner Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: DIPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Our second interpretation of our ever popular DIPA. Unlike our first version, for this beer we move away from the piney, dank bitterness and get into the bold, fruity aromatics associated with modern IPA's. Think you don't like IPAs? Try this one.
name: DIPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A double IPA that is continuously hopped throughout the boil with only Citra hops and then is dry hopped for 7 days with more Citra hops. Expect a lot of citrus and floral notes on the nose of this beer!
name: DIPA de Citra
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: DIPA V6
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: DIPA V7
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
Darkly heroic, Humulus Lupulus (hops) have empowered brews with bite and character since the 11th century.  DirtWolf is a tribute to these untamed vines which rise from the earth with the voracity of a “wolf among sheep.” Hops have made an assertive comeback in American craft brewing.  Revel in the best U.S. varieties of hops, in their natural, whole flower form, as they bring a vital, pungent reality to the soul of a wild element in our dangerously satisfying DirtWolf Double IPA.

This dangerously delicious recipe features often subtle, but sometimes assertive signatures of American hop varieties. Look for: Citra: heavy citrus aroma, fruity flavor; Chinook: grapefruit, resinous pine; Simcoe: dry, piney; and Mosaic: earthy and mildly floral, with notes of sweet citrus and spice.
name: DirtWolf Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Dirty Water
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Discobeer is a vinous IPA thoughtfully blended with 10 % Chardonnay grapes. This Champagne of beer is a real party starter, no more shy beer geek. Drink it and you will own the dance floor.
name: Disco Beer
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Diver Down Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Divide & Conch'r
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Divinator
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
Yeah, drink to the rhythm of this bitter rhyme / So you can get hoppy one more time/
 To the pint and ya don’t stop / It’s that ol’ skool hip with that new skool hop/
 Check the flavor of the brew-rhythm I wrote / And while I got a chance here, let me clear my throat

“Double IPA”
name: DJ IPA Kool
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: 5 different types of hops and a 90 minute boil deliver this high IBU double IPA. The citric balance of this brew will remind you of lazy days at Dock's End.
name: Dock's End
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Dock’s No-No DIPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Dodgy Knight
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: This big juicy Imperial IPA features Citra and Mosaic hops across a dried out malt backbone.
name: Dogs & Boats
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Breaking news that must get through: Our latest Double IPA is ready. Loaded with Amarillo hops and some Calypso mixed in for good measure. Pineapple and pear walking side by side with tropical citrus undertones. A soft bitter finish howls on your palate. Close the door, put out the light. Dogs of Doom takes no prisoners.
name: Dogs Of Doom
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Dominant Dog DIPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Dominatrix
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Donkey-Hote
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
Bringing that classic Hip / Dropping that classic Hop / Cascade, Centennial, Chinook / Old school never stops/
 Don’t believe the hype… (Double I.P.A.)
name: Don’t Believe the Hype
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Doom
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Made using the finest specialty malts: Golden Promise from England (the malt used to make Scotch), Crystal Malt from Chile, and Vienna Malt from Germany. Bittering Hops: Nelson Sauvin and two different dry hops throughout fermentation with Wakatu hops. Finishing Hops: Pacifica and Motueka. We used Australian Ale Yeast, plucked from the outback. The result is a perfectly-balanced double IPA with hop aromas of lime zest and grapefruit.
name: Doovalacky Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
A huge, hoppy brew that will test your sea legs.
Our Dorado Double IPA immediately hooks you with massive hops that never stop. Mash hopping, kettle hopping and dry hopping makes this beer a serious hop lover’s prize catch. It’s an amazingly drinkable, award-winning beer that’s as beautifully balanced as it is big.
name: Dorado Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Dos
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: IPA at its biggest, with close to 4lbs of hops per barrel, the finished product is 135 IBU. The extensive hop additions aren’t just bitter but add flavor and aroma. The high ABV of 11.5% takes the edge off with malty sweetness. Dos Cone Es gets its name because it is a double “Dos” of the Coulter IPA, which is named after the largest pine “Cone” on earth and the “Es” simply is… Also, if you say it fast after having a few is sounds like “Dos cojones”. We also brew an oaked version.
name: Dos Cone Es
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: “You need a gun, I gotta gun for ya!” This Double IPA doesn’t miss a thing. The premium malted barley lures you in, while the chamber load of American hops drops the hammer. The big malty body balances generous hop and aroma. Get ready.
name: Double Action
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
In this experiment, we pushed the boundaries of a well-balanced, high gravity, highly hopped IPA, while increasing drink-ability.

This Double IPA is brewed and generously dry hopped with Mosiac hops. You'll find this ale to have a super floral nose, smooth bitterness, with hints of blueberries, mango, and papaya.
name: Double Actuator
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Ball n Chain IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A robust and malty beer, with an intense hop profile.  We balanced the rich malt flavor with some powerful hop notes from the use of five different hop varieties.
name: Double Barrel Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Hops used Chinook, Citra, and Eldorado.
name: Double Barrel IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: This beer uses a “damn the cost” approach to recipe design. We use 6 lbs of hops per BBL with a majority of those hops being used in late whirlpool additions and dry hopping. Following our steadfast commitment to drinkability in our beers, the abundance of hops produces a significant citrusy aroma and creates a unique “hop nectar” flavor that will surely satisfy the Imperial IPA aficionado. This beer also has a very light, dry malt profile that allows the intense hop flavors to explode from the glass.
name: Double Battle Axe
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Benny
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A serious tongue run! An American black ale full of great malt flavor and dangerous amounts of hops ... for serious advocates of big beer and big flavor.
name: Double Black
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Black IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Brother Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Originally our summer seasonal, demand has forced us to offer the Double Bubble all year long, and we don’t mind one bit. This hop-whopper is the bigger brother to our very popular Bubblejack India Pale Ale. Light in color, the hops do the talking in this full-bodied ale. For this version, we’ve doubled the hops, and added three pounds of local honey per keg. Extremely smooth and slightly sweeter than the original, a little bit goes a long way.
name: Double Bubble
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Hop aromas blast out of this flavor explosion. Massively dry-hopped, with a balanced malt sweetness, this irresistible force showcases the power of bringing in the extra artillery. Hop cubed – then squared (hop to the sixth)! We’ve kept the same malt recipe proportions as Loose Cannon, pumped up to 22 Plato (from 16.5) and then doubled the hops. We employed the late addition-, whirlpool-, hopback-, and dry-hopping process that makes Loose Cannon such a flavorful IPA. We’ve captured the beautiful balance of Loose Cannon but we’ve doubled the firepower.
name: Double Cannon
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Centennial Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Chin DIPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A dry imperial India Pale Ale with a crisp malt backbone that exhibits a slight honey character which helps to balance the hop profile of pine, orange and lemongrass.
name: Double Citrus IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: All about hop aroma & flavor - dry hopped with 4 lbs per barrel of the juiciest, brightest hops we love the most: Mosaic, Nelson, and Citra. High bitterness blends with high abv creating a smooth impression, and a dry finish.
name: Double Cone
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Have you read the description for the regular Crooked Tree yet? Well this beer is almost the same just double the flavor and alcohol. We actually took the Crooked Tree recipe and doubled all of the ingredients except the water, just the way a DOUBLE should be made. Big hops balanced with tons of malt give this beer a huge body. Although this beer is as cool as "The Fonz"  when first purchased, it gets really mellow and smooth with some age. After a year or two stored in a cool dark place you'll notice the heavy caramel and malt flavors are trying to sneak past the hops. This beer is hugely delicious so it will need your undivided attention (the chores can wait....trust us).
name: Double Crooked Tree I.P.A.
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: An unfiltered double ipa full of malt body and hop flavors from Warrior, Centennial and Cascades.
name: Double Cross R’Eyed Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: An imperial IPA that is double dry-hopped, giving it a huge floral nose and a delicious hop-forward character. Notes of citrus and pine are balanced with a lightly sweet malt finish.
name: Double Cutt IIPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Hopheads rejoice!  This strong IPA takes the style to a new level.  It's a big Imperial IPA packed with Nugget, Palisade, and Amarillo hops.  ABV  8.2%
name: Double D IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Double D is a full-bodied Imperial India Pale Ale, flaunting sultry guava, mango, and tropical fruit aromas as a result of dry hopping with Citra, Zythos and Crystal hops. Brewed with light toasted malt and Bravo bittering hops, this double delights with smooth warming alcohols and a torrid finish. A daring draft, she is available in six-packs and on draft.
name: Double D IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Doubling down on malt & hops, Double Daddy raises the stakes. Double Daddy pours a fiery orange with a lasting creamy white head. Triple dry-hopped with west coast varieties, the aroma is lush and floral with notes of grapefruit, tangerine, pine, and spice. Fresh pale malts and an orange marmalade tang balance the bold, bitter hops and lean mouthfeel.
name: Double Daddy
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: There are only 24 hours in a day. We do our best to make the most of them, but find ourselves wanting more. While we can’t change the earth’s rotation, we can brew a bigger beer. We present Double Day Tripper; a dank, dry-hopped 90 IBU Double Pale Ale with intense tropical citrus and floral notes. This is our flagship Day Tripper’s feistier big brother. The day isn’t over friends—get out there and double it!
name: Double Day Tripper
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Death Spiral
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Brewed to celebrate the beginning of our next 20 years of brewing great beer. Debuted as the WABL beer during the 2009 Washington Beer Commission's Cask Festival, and two empty firkins later, the hopheads gave their approval. Preserving the old (Chinook, Cascade, Centennial) while embracing the new (Sorachi Ace), we look forward to hoppier times. O.G. 20.5 Plato, 8% ABV, many IBUs
name: Double Decade India Pale Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Dildo Danger Zone
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Dobis
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Dog Dare IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Dog Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Double Dog Double Pale Ale is a generously hopped ale with a deep red color and pours with a nice frothy head. The abundance of hops will conjure some provocative aromas with hints of raisins and citrus.
name: Double Dog Double Pale Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Doozey
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Otter Creek and Lawson's Finest have gone to great lengths to deliver the highest quality beer that includes water from each brewery, locally sourced specialty malt and a dose of freshly harvest Vermont hops. This collaboration creation combines the talents of the two brewers into the uniquely delicious Double Dose IPA— brewed in the spirit of friendship, fun and really great beer. Cheers!
name: Double Dose
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Down Double Under
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: The Double Down IPA has the bite of a vampire and the heart of a werewolf. This doubly intense IPA will be an onslaught to your senses. It starts with an extreme hop nose derived from copious amount of hops with a 22 pound blend of Cascade, Amarillo, Simcoe, and Chinook. Double Down is an epic battle between caramel malt flavors and intense hop love. You don’t have to choose, you can love them both by taking a drink. This ale is 8.5% abv. Caution: this ale is doubly stronger than the average beer. Drink responsibly.
name: Double Down IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: The next evolution in hoppyness…A lot of IIPA’s out there will kick you in the face with hops…ours certainly does that…but…afterward is cuddles you and tells you everything will be OK with a rich malty backbone sturdy enough to deliver the bright floral, citrus, and piney notes. At 7% ABV this warms the soul and cools the savage beast! Pairs well with spicy foods and smoked meats and cheeses.
name: Double Dragon Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: This double IPA was brewed like Dragon Point, but with more hops and more malt. If you like Dragon Point, you will love this bigger and bolder version.
name: Double Dragon Point
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: We took our award-winning Dragonfly IPA and cranked up the malt and hops, but managed to hold onto the the perfect balance our Dragonfly is known for. The result is a brew with a very powerful hop profile, matching malt character, and an enticing floral nose.
name: Double Dragonfly Imperial IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Dry Hopped - Ruination Double IPA 2.0
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: When we first brewed Duckpin, our little session-style pale ale, it really hit the spot for a go-to, anytime refresher. But we soon felt like we were just practicing. Knocking down all those little Duckpins just made us thirsty for something bigger! So we went back to the brewhouse and doubled down on malts and hops. The result is a double IPA that’s danker than a rental shoe and rolling with ten frames of juicy, resinous hops down a solid lane of malted barley and wheat. When it’s time to bring you’re A game, reach for a Double.
name: Double Duckpin
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: This Double IPA is a voluptuous hop bomb with a striking orange color, reminiscent of the sun glowing off sandy dunes. The aroma, full of honey, pine, umami, and stone fruit, immediately draws you closer to your Double Dunes. The hops make their presence known in the mouth, with a flavor that balances between piney, resiny, and pithy. The finish is then rounded out by a slight alcohol warmth.
name: Double Dunes DIPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Falcon Smash
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Double Fistin’ IPA is an imperial India pale ale fashioned after the Pacific Northwest’s heavily hopped, strong IPAs. Unique in the U.S., this style contains large amounts of Northwest hops imparting a bitter and flowery aromatic flavor. The hops used to create this hop-monster are Columbus and Cascade. In addition to heavy amounts of bittering and post-boil hops, this beer is also given a generous amount of dry- hops in the conditioning stage. The alcohol content is 7.2%. This beer is a signature beer of  Rob Denton.
name: Double Fistin’ IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Half Hitch
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Our take on the Imperial IPA style. Huge hop additions late in the boil and in the fermenter provide intense hop flavor and aroma without harsh bitterness. Watch Out, it is very easy to drink despite the alcohol content.
name: Double HighPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: The Imperial IPA is a very new style, created by taking a regular IPA and amping it up a bit. It is a little lighter in color than a regular IPA, with a nice, vigorous golden hue. There is very little maltiness in this beer, although it has a moderate body. The hops are the stalwart backbone of the style. There is an incredible amount of hop flavor and bitterness, and a definite interplay of varieties and locales in the different types of hops. The dry finish is typical of an IPA, and the result is a big beer, with only a hint of maltiness and a lot of hop character.
name: Double Hop IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Late hopped for maximum aroma and refreshingly bitter finish.
name: Double Hop Monster
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double Impact Zone
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Light amber in color this heavy hitter has a hoppy, slightly bitter finish.  The floral fragrance and citrus flavor profile compliments the medium body and a malt finish.
name: Double Implosion
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A double indemnity clause in a contract or policy affords the covered party two times the value of the stated coverage in the result of a covered claim.  It’s all in the details but nobody ever reads the entire contract anyway. That’s why getting what you deserve isn’t always easy, and getting twice what you expected is almost impossible. But we gave our lawyers the day off and while nobody was looking, we took the hops intended for two different batches and slipped them all into this IPA.  Then, instead of burying the fact in some obscure clause in a contract somewhere, we’re bragging about it right here on the label. We were never fans of fine print anyway. The good news is you get twice the payout.
name: Double Indemnity Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double India Pale Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double India Pale Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Light copper color and medium body. Unfiltered and dry hopped twice, this ale has an intense floral and fruity aroma, spicy flavor, and bitterness.
name: Double India Pale Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Our Double IPA is made with pale and light crystal malts. It is going to give the beer a deep pale color and malty flavor. It will also give it a very strong taste. It is hopped liberally with Apollo, Cascade, Chinook, and Centennial hops. This is going to give the beer a pleasant bitter taste and an intense hop flavor and aroma. The extra bitterness will mix with the strong sweet flavor from the malt to give the beer a very balanced taste. The result is a very bold and flavorful IPA.
name: Double India Pale Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double India Pale Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double India Pale Ale
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Celebrate Hops! This beauty is packed full of hop flavor and all things hops. Chill to cellar temp 52-54 F Pour into a Rock Art pint glass with a generous head, grasp with authority and indulge yourself with hops. SLOW FOODS experience, pair this with an extra sharp cheddar and a spicy venison chili. For the surf lover, try scallops sautéed in butter and garlic, served on a bed of linguine and pink Alfredo sauce with a side of roasted sweet red peppers and asparagus tips. Maybe add some zip to your favorite chef’s salad. Whether it’s 90 degrees out or your knee deep in pow pow.....
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Our Double IPA packs a strong punch and never loses the delicate characteristics of a traditional IPA. This brew pours a golden, chestnut brown and has a distinct, fruity hop aroma that compliments its lively and fresh flavor. Citrus and floral notes blend with a slight caramel maltiness. The Double IPA was created in England to withstand long travel to its colonies. Today, we’re only worried about the distance from the tap to your glass!
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Here you go hopheads – we brewed this one just for you!!  55+ pounds of hops, lots of local honey and a little citrus just for some added kick. Golden in color with a nice rounded malt middle, ending with a huge punch of hop bitterness.  Get it while it lasts because it won’t be around for long!
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Our take on this modern American style is big, bold, and beautifully balanced. Using three varieties of the finest American Pacific Northwest hops, along with British malts, we’ve expertly crafted a high gravity Double IPA that drinks like a session beer. Up front assertive hop aroma and flavor gives way to a silky malt finish. Savor every sip and just say...YEE-HAW!
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: pale copper brown with a very high fresh and lively hop aroma and a medium malt character.
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: 2 row malt makes this beer clean, crisp, and dry. Crystal 60 adds the color to this “pale ale.” The Apollo and Crystal hops are aggressive and dominant, resulting in a strong citrus/pine flavor. The light earthy spice comes from the Amarillo, Sterling, and Northern Brewer hops.
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: It is every bryggares dream is to combine such large amounts of malt and hops in this sturdy double IPA. The style was invented in the United States in the 2000s by a few pioneers who wanted to bring the IPA to even greater heights when it comes to malt body, hops aromas and hop bitterness. Our DIPA is an exercise in the art of combining karamellig malt and yeast with massive fruity hops.
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A full bodied citrus flavored Double IPA that is Extremely Hoppy but still has that same smooth clean finish that you will find in all of our brews!
name: DOUBLE IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Our Double IPA is handcrafted for the well-traveled craft beer enthusiast using Pale Ale, Munich, and Caramalt to achieve an original gravity of 19 Plato. The hop bill consists of a Magnum, Cascade, and Summit used at different times in the boil as well as dry hopping.
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description:
Assertive and drinkable. Double IPA is California’s gift to beer lovers. Ours is brewed with four distinctly American hops: Centennial, Citra, Columbus and Simcoe, all beautifully balanced by five malts and generous additions of local orange blossom honey. An intense sensory experience — the fresh aroma of citrus, pine and grapefruit with the bold taste of hops and sweet honey.

This beer was first brewed to celebrate American Craft Beer Week in 2010. The Double IPA style is distinctly American, and so are the flavors of the specific hops used. This beer was an instant hit (Southern Californians do love their hops!) and we plan on brewing it throughout the year whenever our production schedule allows it.
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Propeller Double IPA is a full bodied, American style Double India Pale Ale that is brewed with premium Pacific Northwest hops and a rich blend of 2-row Pale and Crystal malts. Following fermentation it has been heavily dry hopped (a process that enhances the aroma without imparting bitterness in beer) giving this bold brew its big west coast nose. Double IPA delivers a huge amount of piney, floral, and citrusy hop aroma and flavor from start to finish that is balanced by sweet malt flavors. At 8.2% alcohol by volume and 85 IBUs, Propeller Double IPA is not for everyone… It is a TRUE hop bomb, for TRUE hopheads.
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Every year, we anxiously await the sunny season when we unleash our abundantly hoppy AleSmith Double IPA. Originally known to hopheads around the nation as "AleSmith Summer YuleSmith," this Imperial India Pale Ale bursts forth with bright scents and flavors reminiscent of freshly picked oranges, grapefruits, and tangerines offset by undertones of pine resin and herbal spice. A sturdy malt backbone balances out profound hop bitterness for a refreshing yet assertive, decidedly West Coast beer offering an unapologetically bold expression of fresh American hops.
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A local hopped Black Double IPA, released just in time to pull you out of the winter blues, kick the frost off the ground and signify the start of the planting season. Keep an eye out for this seasonal brew hitting the taps the first day of spring!
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Just like the name implies, brewing a batch of pFriem Double IPA takes twice the regular amount of malt and hops. That means each pint is brimming with doubly-rich aromas of fresh berries, notes of papaya and a malty sweetness. Just make sure to raise your glasses twice because a beer like this deserves a double cheers.
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: West Coast style with hop intensity.  CTZ, Centennial and Cascade create the citrus spice that shine in this palate-scrubbing ale.  Dry hopping with CTZ and Centennial adds to the robust flavor and bitterness.
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: We created this recipe to showcase, first and foremost, the hops. This beer has a strong hop aroma with a long bitter finish.
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: Our Double India Pale Ale is bigger in hop character and alcohol than our Extra Pale Ale. It is sure to please even the most discerning hop-head! Also known as Imperial IPA, this intensely hoppy, yet very drinkable beer lets the malty characteristics take a step back and allows the hops to really shine. Brewed with almost two (2) pounds of hops per barrel and left unfiltered, Six Row Double IPA showcases the citrusy and piney characteristics of the Columbus, Centennial, and Chinook hops. Double IPA is served in a 10oz snifter.
name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

name: Double IPA
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale

description: A golden full bodied DIPA layered with resiny aroma and a hint of citrus flavor.
name: Double IPA

description: A heavily dry hopped IPA with Mosiac & Centinnel hops. Light malt balance with a bold, tropic aroma.
name: Double IPA

name: Double IPA
